BR_text.BRdescription:
The  is creating but not using the .
 See here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/blob/master/examples/lm_finetuning.py#L55>https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/blob/master/examples/lm_finetuning.py#L55</denchmark-link>
 
 I think it should say prediction_heads=[lm_prediction_head, next_sentence_head], instead of         prediction_heads=[lm_prediction_head],.
 Also see here in : <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/blob/master/examples/train_from_scratch.py#L73>https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/blob/master/examples/train_from_scratch.py#L73</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
Yes, you are totally right! Thanks for reporting.
 Do you want to create a PR or shall I take care of it?

comments_2.comment_text: Well - the fix was not that hard. :-) See PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/pull/273>#273</denchmark-link>

comments_3.comment_text:
We really appreciate any support from the community. Even if it's such small fixes :)
 Thank you, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PhilipMay>@PhilipMay</denchmark-link>
  !
